features: 【Automatic Connection & Plug-Play】Auto-connect the receiver to your device via a Lightning cable/Type-C cable/3.5mm port/USB adapter.No driver installation or app download is required, making it an incredibly user-friendly option.Tips: The green light will always on when successfully connected.

【3 in 1 Universal Receiver】 The upgraded lapel mini microphone comes with a 3 in 1 universal receiver, eliminating the need to replace multiple individual interfaces or interface cables. The equipment compatible with a wide range of devices such as iPhone, iPad, Android phones, DSLR cameras, laptops, etc.

【Universal 2.4G Wireless Transmission】Our wireless microphone uses 2.4G wireless international universal frequency band.Featured with fast connection, high signal stability, low interference and short audio delay. 65ft/20m distance allows you to enjoy high audio transmission recordings indoors and outdoors.

【Noise Cancellation & 7H Long working 】Built-in bluetooth microphone noise Cancellation and advanced 2.4GHz transmission technology. The omni-directional wireless lapel microphone gives best clear timbre. The sound picking-up follows the picture in real-time and will not be misplaced.And manual noise reduction is also available.

【Portable Carry & 1 Year Warranty】Concise, stylish design. Its compact size is convenient to video creating at anywhere, anytime. We provide 3 year warranty and 24 hours consult service. The package includes 2*Microphone, 2*Type-C charging cable, 1*3-in-1 multi-function receiver, 1*User manual 2* Sponge 2*Microphone Clips

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Can i use the micrphone on my camera to record video? Yes,This microphone is a 3-in-1 device,which means it can support IOS,Android,and 3.5 mm camera connections. Can i use the micrphone while charging it at the same time? Yes,you can use the microphone while charging. Did it need to install additional software to use microphone? No,Simply plug in the receiver to start using the microhone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This microphone gets the job done and then some! Great for iPhone!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Mini Microphone Wireless Lavalier Lapel Microphone for my iPhone and let me tell you, it's a game-changer for content creators like myself. From YouTube interviews to TikTok vlogs, this little device packs a punch in terms of professional sound quality and convenience.First off, the sound quality is impressive. It captures crisp, clear audio that rivals larger, more expensive setups. The noise reduction feature ensures that background noise is minimized, resulting in a clean recording every time. Whether I'm conducting interviews or recording solo content, this microphone delivers professional-grade sound that impresses every time.The clip-on design is incredibly handy, allowing me to easily attach it to my clothing for hands-free recording. This is especially useful during interviews or when I'm on the move creating content for TikTok. Plus, the wireless feature gives me the freedom to move around without being tethered to my recording device.Speaking of recording devices, I also use this microphone with my Zoom H4n recorder, and it works seamlessly. The compatibility with different devices makes it a versatile tool for any content creator.Battery life is another standout feature. I can rely on it to last through extended recording sessions without needing frequent recharging, which is crucial for staying productive.Overall, I couldn't be happier with my purchase of the Mini Microphone Wireless Lavalier Lapel Microphone. It's a compact yet powerful tool that enhances the audio quality of my content, whether I'm creating YouTube interviews or TikTok vlogs. If you're in the market for a high-quality microphone for your iPhone or other recording devices, look no further. This microphone gets the job done and then some!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So clear and works great! Easy set up also!
reviews.reviewText: Such a great deal for the money! The sound is so clear! I have fun making TikTok videos with them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: What a great buy! These mics are small, yet powerful. Excellent when recording on the move. Picks up just about any sound in the room. This is definitely a worthy purchase.

reviews.reviewerName: Pretty decent quality mics for this price, super easy to use!
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I liked that it was easy use and was decent quality when not speaking into to super close, only thing wrong was if you speak into to close it makes the audio sound terrible and crackly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and reliable!
reviews.reviewText: I got the mini microphone as a Christmas present for my older sister since she’s been wanting one and she loved it when she opened it! It’s really easy to use and it works really well; I’ll definitely be buying one for myself!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It seems like a simple setup, let the devices pair and then plug in to phone, but the microphone just didn't work. My video is still using the phone mic, not the wireless.Frustrating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Echo and sensitive
reviews.reviewText: I just received my microphone today and they seem to work well enough. My problem is that I bought it for a personal amplifier that I wear and you can't get within 5 ft of the receiver unless you want horrible feedback. The microphone is also very sensitive, so the volume is super loud even with my amp turned all the way down. I imagine this would work well as long as your receiver is further away, if you're trying to use it for speakers at an event.There is also a delay which is kind of annoying, but the sound is still clear, besides the static and the background that doesn't change at all with the volume.It advertises that it has noise-cancelling, but it does not. Anything near the mic, it's going to pick it up. If you're trying to use this mic where other people might be talking or there might be background noise, this is not a good choice for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great pair of mics for recording!
reviews.reviewText: This was an excellent purchase! I was looking to purchase a mic for a reasonable price, but also with good sound. This comes with everything that you need. It’s great that it works alongside an iPhone, or an android. The puffs that come with it help tremendously with any background noise. I loaded a video, and as you can tell, I move the mic around on my sweater and it does not pick up any noise from the sweater at all, great product and highly recommend! I’ve used other products, and I’ve had to make returns for several different reasons. The charging is so easy, you can charge all three items at the same time for use. I’ve gone as kind as three hours recording without them dying on me. Purchase and you won’t be disappointed!
